title: Account possibly hacked, How worried should I be?
body:
So I was looking at my email today and it said "Your account requested a password change" , now i never asked for a password change so I just ignored it thinking someone was trying to hack into my account. 

I then got home a few hours later, and tried to log into my account and it said "incorrect username and password" , i have had the same account password for like 4 years, i tried it like 20 times but it just wasn't working. So I requested a password change and was able to log back into my account. My only fear is, how was my password for league changed? Does this mean I got into my yahoo, I personally use the same password for everything (except after this i changed all my passwords just in case), should i have any more worry for my league acc being hacked?

replies.body: That's a scary notification to come across, so I highly recommend running through our account protection guide to protect your info in and outside of League.  It is likely that your email might be compromised as well, so you'll definitely want to look into that portion.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and our account team can help with account recovery, we got your back!
